EmailTemplate.name: 17.Nuage.XLE.webXLE.L.G.N.8227.XLE Gamechanger.Email Asset 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Banking on a new private cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Discover this bank's secret to longevity Investing in a private cloud pays off for visionary 300-year-old bank This Bank’s visionary goal of becoming the “Go-To” bank for the world required a new and innovative private cloud infrastructure, which it implemented with the help of new strategic providers including Nuage Networks – a Nokia company.
Learn about the Bank’s success in: Centuries Young Bank readies for another century of progress. Enjoy the read.
Michael Williams | Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
